pages.text: The Ender Blade allows you to teleport up to 8 blocks in the direction you are looking.
The Void Scepter, similar to the Ender Blade, allows you to teleport up to 10 blocks in the direction you are looking. However, you implode upon teleporting, damaging mobs around you.
The Seeking Amulet allows you to teleport to a set location from anywhere upon use. You can set a location by shift-right clicking on a block.
